pro_req.title: Request to Join as a Pro
pro_req.req_time_note: Average completion time: 2–3 minutes. You can pause and resume later.
pro_req.company_hint: If you’re a freelancer without a company name, you can leave this empty.
pro_req.name_ph: The name you want to display on the site
pro_req.field_hint: Start typing to see common suggestions.
pro_req.phone_hint: Ideally a direct mobile. We can also show WhatsApp if relevant.
pro_req.desc_ph: A few words about your experience, job types and key strengths.
pro_req.desc_hint: In 2–3 sentences: what you do, where you work, and why clients should choose you.
pro_req.reviews_ph: Client names, a short note about successful jobs, or a link to reviews.
pro_req.reviews_hint: You can paste multiple names/paragraphs; we’ll format them nicely.
pro_req.photo_importance: Clients respond faster to profiles with a clear photo. Aim for a front-facing, well-lit shot with a clean background.
pro_req.photo_tip_light: Natural light is best; avoid harsh shadows.
pro_req.photo_tip_face: Looking at the camera with a light smile feels trustworthy.
pro_req.photo_tip_bg: Tidy or plain background looks more professional.
pro_req.video_importance: Our tests show profiles with a short video tend to get more inquiries (sometimes up to 2×), depending on content quality. 30–60s is ideal.
pro_req.video_q_intro: Start with a short intro: who you are and what you offer.
pro_req.video_q_experience: Mention brief experience with similar jobs.
pro_req.video_q_specialty: Highlight a specialty that sets you apart.
pro_req.video_q_area: State your service areas and typical availability.
pro_req.video_q_call: Close with a call-to-action: “Contact me to schedule.”
pro_req.video_note: Supported: MP4 / WebM / Ogg · up to 50MB. Prefer landscape.
pro_req.hours_hint: You may add multiple ranges for different days. If unsure, keep one range.
